title: Plat 5 Jungler main LFT
body:
Hello 
Im currently Platinum 5, Jungle main looking for a team that is active I'm available on weekends and most times after 4 PM I have no Skype or teamspeak ( Don't like my voice D: ) 
Champions i play the most are currently {{champion:113}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:98}} 
I do play all the other junglers and understand them heaps and are able to play them when wanted me to 
I'm Able to play Support, ADC if needed, Support is my 2nd choice as i have Thresh, Sona as my most played champions 
( I don't play fiddlesticks, aatrox,)
Please Add me IGN: ImDuhN00b Thank you for your time 
PS. Very good at smites ;D have had heaps of times changing tides of rank games by stealing dragons and barons
http://www.lolking.net/summoner/oce/3690386#profile

replies.body: Add me demonsiayer, hopefully tonight we can get some ranked 5 games going
